p: Thirty-two (32) healthy Wistar rats weighing between 180 and 190â€‰g of either sex were obtained from the Laboratory Animal Center of College of Medicine, University of Lagos, Idi-Araba, Lagos, Nigeria. The rats were housed in clean, sharp cages and kept in a spacious room under room temperature at the Animal House of Faculty of Basic Medical Sciences, Obafemi Awolowo College of Health Sciences, Olabisi Onabanjo University, Ikenne, Ogun, Nigeria.
